text:
I recently experimented with the drag and drop email tool and have some questions I was hoping someone could help answer. Thank you.

- Can you save newly created layouts as templates? Or are you limited to the templates by HubSpot?
- Are you restricted from writing your own custom CSS? What if you want to make some fine tuned adjustments?
- Would developers ever be able to create templates?
- Will this functionality phase out the current email system and templates? Or will this work in tandem with the current way of creating coded email templates (the user experience of building emails is different)?
The new email builder is going to eventually replace the old one. Template creation for drag n drop is planned but not currently possible
Shay, already contacted HS support, but thanks! I'll keep this in mind!
